content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case involved two exspouses and the division of their goods the legal procedure lasted for 2 years 4 months and 6 days starting on september 30 2013 and ending on february 5 2016 the defendant has been ordered to pay the plaintiffs costs which amount to 258960 eur the final resolution of the case states that the goods will be divided equally between the exspouses with each receiving half of the total value of 50000 eur the decision was based on specific sections of the marriage family relations act
